modelIdentification.name: NETN-ETR_v2.0.3
modelIdentification.description: Module for sending and reporting task at entity level i.e. vehicle or aggregate level.
modelIdentification.useHistory: v1.0.0 - First version of the module. It is development of the old NETN-LBML FOM module.
v2.0.1 - Modified version as described in "LLBML-ChangeProposal-v0.8.docx"
v2.0.2 - Modified version as described in "LLBML-ChangeProposal-v0.9.docx"
v2.0.3 - modified version as described in "LLBML-ChangeProposal-v0.10.docx"

interactionClass.name: ETR_Root
interactionClass.semantics: Root interaction class for the Entitiy Tasking and Reporting (ETR) interaction classes.

interactionClass.name: ETR_Task
interactionClass.semantics: A base interaction class for more specialized task interaction classes.

parameter.name: TaskId
parameter.semantics: Identifies the task.

parameter.name: Taskee
parameter.semantics: The entity that has to execute the task.

parameter.name: Tasker
parameter.semantics: Identifies the commander of the task. When empty, the commander is not defined.

parameter.name: StartWhen
parameter.semantics: Time when the task execution has to start. Use the value 00000000000000.000 to indicate that the time is undefined.

parameter.name: Why
parameter.semantics: For what reason has this task to be executed. When empty, the reason is not defined.

parameter.name: TaskMode
parameter.semantics: Determines the task mode.

interactionClass.name: Move
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to move in the specified direction for the given duration.

parameter.name: Direction
parameter.semantics: Determines the azimuth direction, in radians.

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.semantics: The duration of the move (seconds)

interactionClass.name: MoveToLocation
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to move to the specified location.

parameter.name: Destination
parameter.semantics: The location to move to.

parameter.name: MoveType
parameter.semantics: Indicates if roads have to be followed.

parameter.name: Waypoints
parameter.semantics: Optional route to the destination.

interactionClass.name: MoveToEntity
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to move to another entity.

parameter.name: Entity
parameter.semantics: The entity to move to.

parameter.name: MoveType
parameter.semantics: Indicates if roads have to be followed.

parameter.name: Waypoints
parameter.semantics: Optional route to the destination.

interactionClass.name: MoveIntoFormation
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an aggregate entity to move into the given formation with the given heading.

parameter.name: Formation
parameter.semantics: The category of positional arrangement the aggregate.

parameter.name: Location
parameter.semantics: The location (x, y and z) to move to.

parameter.name: Heading
parameter.semantics: The heading of the formation in radians.

interactionClass.name: FollowEntity
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to follow another entity.

parameter.name: Entity
parameter.semantics: The entity to follow.

parameter.name: Behind
parameter.semantics: The distance in meters behind the entity to follow.

parameter.name: Right
parameter.semantics: The distance in meters to the right of the entity to follow.

parameter.name: Above
parameter.semantics: The distance in meters above the entity to follow.

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.semantics: The duration of the folow action (seconds).

interactionClass.name: TurnToHeading
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to turn to the specified heading.

parameter.name: Heading
parameter.semantics: Determines the heading, in radians, an entity has to turn to.

interactionClass.name: TurnToOrientation
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to turn to a specified orientation, including pitch and roll.

parameter.name: Pitch
parameter.semantics: Defines the angle ot the pitch.

parameter.name: Roll
parameter.semantics: Defines the angle ot the roll.

interactionClass.name: Mount
interactionClass.semantics: Task the entity to mount in the specified entity. The taskee entiity should be within a certain distance tolerance of the entiity to mount into. this tolerance must be specified in the federation agreements. Mount includes: embark (vessel), board (plane), and so on.

parameter.name: EntityId
parameter.semantics: Id of the entiy in which the taskee entity is mounted.

interactionClass.name: Dismount
interactionClass.semantics: Task the entity to dismount from the entity where it is in.

interactionClass.name: FireAtLocation
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to fire at a location.

parameter.name: TargetLocation
parameter.semantics: The location to fire at.

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.semantics: The duration of the fire (seconds).

interactionClass.name: FireAtLocationWM
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to fire at a location with the specified weapon and munition.

parameter.name: WeaponTypeToUse
parameter.semantics: Preferd weapon type.

parameter.name: MunitionTypeToUse
parameter.semantics: Prefered muntion type.

parameter.name: QuantityFired
parameter.semantics: Number of rounds to fire

parameter.name: RateOfFire
parameter.semantics: Number of rounds per second.

interactionClass.name: FireAtEntity
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to fire at another specified entity.

parameter.name: Target
parameter.semantics: The entity to fire at.

interactionClass.name: FireAtEntityWM
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to fire at a specified entity with the specified weapon and munition.

parameter.name: WeaponTypeToUse
parameter.semantics: Preferd weapon type.

parameter.name: MunitionTypeToUse
parameter.semantics: Prefered munition type.

parameter.name: QuantityFired
parameter.semantics: Number of rounds.

parameter.name: RateOfFire
parameter.semantics: Number of rounds per second.

interactionClass.name: SetOrderedSpeed
interactionClass.semantics: Set/Change the ordered speed. Usually sent in ConcurrentMode to adjust the current move task.

parameter.name: Speed
parameter.semantics: Determines the ordered speed to set for an entity, in m/s.

interactionClass.name: SetOrderedAltitude
interactionClass.semantics: Set/Change the ordered altitude for a flying entity. Usually sent in ConurrentMode to adjust the current move task.

parameter.name: Altitude
parameter.semantics: Defines the altitude.

parameter.name: AltitudeType
parameter.semantics: Above the ground or sea.

interactionClass.name: Wait
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to wait a defined duration.

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.semantics: Specifies the wait time (seconds).

interactionClass.name: SetRulesOfEngagement
interactionClass.semantics: Change the rules of engagment for an entity.

parameter.name: RulesOfEngagement
parameter.semantics: Determines the rules of engagment for a entity.

interactionClass.name: EstablishCheckPoint
interactionClass.semantics:
The task defines a location where a checkpoint shall be established and then operated.
If the Taskee entity is not at the specified location, it has to move to that location with a seperate move task. The taskee entiity should be within a certain distance tolerance (specified in the federation agreements) of the location where the checkpoint should be established to make the task possible.
A checkpoint instance (NETN-SE FOM) shall be created and registerd when the entity reaches the location for the checkpoint. The attribute CheckPoint.Deactivated (from RPR_v2) shall show the status of the checkpoint.
The modelling federate decides when the checkpoint shall be activated, it may be direct at the creation or when the attribute PercentComplete has reached a threshold level.
The modelling federate may register a NETN_CulturalFeature instance to model the checkpoint. Set the attribute CheckPoint.ReferencedObjectIdentifier to the NETN_CulturalFeature instance. The attribute NETN_CulturalFeature.Status shall be ActiveStatusEnum8.Active when the checkpoint is operated.
The duraction defines when the checkpoint is deactivated unless another entity from the modelling federate Operates the checkpoint.
The federation agreements shall specify how the ownership of the dynamic attribute at the checkpoint shall be managed when the checkpoint is deactivated. One of the following cases shall be managed in the federation:
1. Dynamic attributes of the checkpoint are released with the HLA Ownership Management services unconditionalAttributeOwnershipDivestiture at deactivation.
2. Only one federate may establish and operate a specific checkpoint.
3. Use NETN TMR Pattern, the federate modelling the entity that shall operate the checkpoint requests the ownership from the current owner of the dynamic attributes.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.semantics: Name of the Check Point.

parameter.name: Location
parameter.semantics: The coordinated for the Check Point.

parameter.name: UniqueId
parameter.semantics: May be generated by the current system if not defined. (The current system creates a object instance of the object class NETN-SE CheckPoint)

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.semantics: The duration of the action (seconds)

interactionClass.name: OperateCheckPoint
interactionClass.semantics:
The task activates a deactivated check point.
If the Taskee entity is not at the checkpoint location, it has to move to that location with a seperate move task. The taskee entiity should be within a certain distance tolerance (specified in the federation agreements) of the location of the checkpoint to make the task possible.
The attribute CheckPoint.Deactivated (from RPR_v2) shall show the status at the checkpoint.
If a NETN_CulturalFeature is accociated with the checkpoint the status shall be displayed for the NETN_CulturalFeature instance.
See semantics for the interaction EstablishCheckPoint how ownership of the dynamics attribute at the checkpoint instance shall be managed.

parameter.name: UniqueId
parameter.semantics: Identifier for the CheckPoint

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.semantics: The duration of the action (seconds)

interactionClass.name: StopAtSideOfRoad
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to stop at the side of the road. This task is only relevant for an entity that is moving along a road to a destination. The executing move task is canceled and a new move is defined to a position at the side of the road (the simulator has to calculate this location).

interactionClass.name: RemoveCheckPoint
interactionClass.semantics:
This task removes the checkpoint that is generated in the EstablishCheckpoint task.
If the Taskee entity is not at the specified location, it has to move to that location with a seperate move task. The taskee entiity should be within a certain distance tolerance (specified in the federation agreements) of the location of the checkpoint to make the task possible.
A checkpoint instance (NETN-SE FOM) shall be removed from the Federation Execution when the entity reaches the location for the checkpoint.
If a NETN_CulturalFeature instance is assigned to the checkpoint is shall be deleted.

parameter.name: UniqueId
parameter.semantics: Identifier for the CheckPoint

interactionClass.name: CreateObstacle
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to create an obstacle with the given geometry. The taskee entiity should be within a certain distance tolerance (specified in the federation aggrement) of one of the points of the geometry of the obstacle to make the task possible. The corresponding Environment Object instance in the RPR-FOM should be created.

parameter.name: ObstacleType
parameter.semantics: The type of the obstacle defined by the entity type of the obstacle (SISO REF-010-2018 Land Culture Features) .

parameter.name: GeometryType
parameter.semantics: The type of the geometry which can be Point, Polygon or Area

parameter.name: Geometry
parameter.semantics: A set of points defining the point, polygon or area of the Obstacle.

parameter.name: UniqueId
parameter.semantics: A unique UUID of the Obstacle.

interactionClass.name: CreateMinefield
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to create a minefield within the specified geometry. The taskee should publish the minefield as a RPR-FOM object when finished. This interaction should not be confused with the MinefieldObjectTransaction interaction of the RPR-FOM, which asks a federate directly to “magic create” a minefield. Warning: The RPR-FOM contains several ways of representing a minefield, and the taskee may decide which representation to use. It is recommended to agree on this in advance, through the use of a Federation Agreement. Allowed values for attributes of the parent (CreateObstacle): - ObstacleType = (5.1.0.5.10.*.* or 5.1.0.5.11.*.* or 5.1.0.5.12.*.*) - GeometryType = Area

parameter.name: TypeOfMines
parameter.semantics: Type of mines used defined by the EntityTypeStruct see section 15.5, UID 418, SISO-REF-010-2018.

parameter.name: MineCount_MineDensity
parameter.semantics: Can contain either the count of mines, or the density

interactionClass.name: ClearObstacle
interactionClass.semantics: Task an entity to clear the obstacle or minefield with the given ID. The taskee entiity should be within a certain distance tolerance (specified in the federation aggrement) of one of the points of the geometry of the obstacle to make the task possible.

parameter.name: UniqueId
parameter.semantics: A unique UUID of the Obstacle.

interactionClass.name: AddPassage
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to lay/build a passage between the two given points. The passage can for example be a passage through an obstacle or a bridge over a river. The taskee entiity should be within a certain distance tolerance (specified in the federation aggrement) of one of the points of the passage to make the task possible. The corresponding Environment Object instance in the RPR-FOM should be created.

parameter.name: Point1
parameter.semantics: The line between point1 and point2 defines the geometry of the passage.

parameter.name: Point2
parameter.semantics: The line between point1 and point2 defines the geometry of the passage.

parameter.name: UniqueId
parameter.semantics: A unique UUID of the passage.

interactionClass.name: RemovePassage
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an entity to remove the pasasage with the given ID. The taskee entiity should be within a certain distance tolerance (specified in the federation aggrement) of one of the points of the passage to make the task possible.

parameter.name: UniqueId
parameter.semantics: A unique UUID of the passage.

interactionClass.name: Patrol
interactionClass.semantics: Defines a patrol, covering the path from the current location to the start point of the patrol route, and the patrol route itself. The patrol route will be followed from start to end. The entity behaviour at the end point depends on the patrol type.

parameter.name: PatrolRoute
parameter.semantics: Describes the route to patrol.

parameter.name: PatrolType
parameter.semantics: Defines how the patrol shall be excuted. The total move from the start point to start point (for patroltype is circle and reverse) is defined as one cycle (see also PatrolRepeating).

parameter.name: MoveType
parameter.semantics: Defines how the entity shall move during the patrol route.

interactionClass.name: PatrolRepeating
interactionClass.semantics:
Task an entity to repeat a patrol task for the given duration. For this task the patrol type other is not allowed.
When the duration time has elapsed then the last cycle of the patrol will be completed before the task ends.
If the time of a cycle takes longer then the interval time then the cylce starts directly (without delay). If the time of a cylce takes less then the interval time then the entiy waits in the first point for the remaining time before the next cycle is started.

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.semantics: The duration of the total patrol task.

parameter.name: IntervalTime
parameter.semantics: The interval time between two cycles.

interactionClass.name: ETR_Report
interactionClass.semantics: A base interaction class for more specialized report interaction classes.

parameter.name: ReportId
parameter.semantics: Identifies the Report

parameter.name: When
parameter.semantics: Date and time when the reported status was valid.

parameter.name: Comments
parameter.semantics: Any additional comments

interactionClass.name: StatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Status report from an entity about its own (perceived) state. This report is generated with a certain frequency specified in the federation agreements.

parameter.name: EntityId
parameter.semantics: The entity that is reported about.

interactionClass.name: PositionStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Report about the position, speed, and heading of the entity.

parameter.name: Position
parameter.semantics: Position of the entity at the specified time.

parameter.name: Heading
parameter.semantics: Heading of the entity.

parameter.name: Speed
parameter.semantics: Speed of the entity.

interactionClass.name: DamageStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Damage status report of an entity. The possible damage staets are possible: NoDamage, SlightDamage, ModerateDamage, SignificantDamage, Destroyed.

parameter.name: DamageType
parameter.semantics: Damage state of the reported entity.

interactionClass.name: ResourceStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Report about the remaning amount of a resource.

parameter.name: Resource
parameter.semantics: The type of resource and remaining quantity.

interactionClass.name: UnderAttackStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Report that the entity is under attack.

parameter.name: FromDirection
parameter.semantics: FromDirection (Direction from which the entity is attacked, between 0..2π or -1 when not specified.)

parameter.name: Severeness
parameter.semantics: Severeness of the attack upon the reporting entity.

interactionClass.name: SpotReport
interactionClass.semantics: Spot reports are reports used by all entities to transmit intelligence or information about a spotted enemy, neutral, or unknown entity.

parameter.name: Observer
parameter.semantics: Entity that observed the enemy (or neutral/unknown entity) and sends the spot report.

parameter.name: IdentificationLevel
parameter.semantics: The identification level of the entit(y)(ies) spotted.

parameter.name: SpottedEntities
parameter.semantics: Spotted entities at the time specified in the parameter 'When'.

interactionClass.name: SensorReport
interactionClass.semantics: The entities that have been observed by a specific sensor. The attributes can be: Detected, Recognized or Identified.

parameter.name: SensorType
parameter.semantics: The type of the sensor that detected the entit(y)(ies).

interactionClass.name: InWeaponRangeReport
interactionClass.semantics: The entities that are in range of a specific weapon.

parameter.name: Observer
parameter.semantics: Entity that observed the enemy (or neutral/unknown entity) and sends the report.

parameter.name: WeaponType
parameter.semantics: The type of the weapon.

parameter.name: EntitiesInWeaponRange
parameter.semantics: Array with entities.

interactionClass.name: ETR_TaskManagement
interactionClass.semantics: A base interaction class for more specialized task management interaction classes.

parameter.name: TaskManagementId
parameter.semantics: Identifies the management task.

parameter.name: Taskee
parameter.semantics: The entity that has to execute the task.

parameter.name: Tasker
parameter.semantics: Identifies the commander of the task.

interactionClass.name: CancelSpecifiedTasks
interactionClass.semantics: Cancel all specified tasks. Tasks already started are also cancelled.

parameter.name: Tasks
parameter.semantics: Tasks that have to be cancelled.

interactionClass.name: CancelAllTasks
interactionClass.semantics: Cancel all tasks. Tasks already started are also cancelled.

interactionClass.name: TaskStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: A report about the status of a task given to an entity. The status of the task defined by the TaskId can be: Accepted, Refused, Cancelled, Executing, Completed or Error.

parameter.name: TaskId
parameter.semantics: Identifies the task associated with the task report.

parameter.name: TaskStatus
parameter.semantics: Indicates the evaluation status of the task.

parameter.name: When
parameter.semantics: Creation date and time of the report.

parameter.name: Comments
parameter.semantics: Any additional comments. For example reason for cancelling, error, etc.

interactionClass.name: ETR_SimCon
interactionClass.semantics: A base interaction class for EXCON Task interaction classes.

parameter.name: TaskId
parameter.semantics: Identifies the task

parameter.name: Taskee
parameter.semantics: The entity that has to execute the task

parameter.name: Tasker
parameter.semantics: Indetifies the commander of the task.

interactionClass.name: MagicMove
interactionClass.semantics: Place the entity to the specified location with a given heading. All given task of the entity are cancelled.

parameter.name: Location
parameter.semantics: The new location for the entity

parameter.name: Heading
parameter.semantics: The entity is set in the position without a move order and without using simulation time (magic placement). The orienation will be set in the given heading.

interactionClass.name: MagicResource
interactionClass.semantics: Changes the resource amount of the entity.

parameter.name: Resource
parameter.semantics: Defines the resource type that will get a new quantity value.

interactionClass.name: QueryCapabilitiesSupported
interactionClass.semantics: Query which ETR tasks and ETR reports that the entity supports. The taskee shall respond with a CapabilitiesSupported message.

interactionClass.name: CapabilitiesSupported
interactionClass.semantics: Provide the set of ETR tasks and ETR reports that the entity supports. This interaction is in response to a QueryCapabilitiesSupported, using the same Taskee and Tasker.

parameter.name: CapabilityNames
parameter.semantics: Array of task and report names that the entity supports; the names match with the FOM interaction class names.

enumeratedData.name: RulesOfEngagementEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: Rules of engagment for a simulated entity.

enumeratedData.name: IdentificationLevelEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: The identification level of an object.

enumeratedData.name: MoveTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: CrossCountry: move directly to the destination without taking into account the roads. OnlyRoads: stay on the roads to get to the closest point to the destination that is still on a road; if there is no road very near to the start (within around 10 meters) there will be no movement at all. RoadsAndCrossCountry: move to the destination by taking into account the roads; it is allowed to go off the road.

enumeratedData.name: AttackTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The kind of attack by the enemy.

enumeratedData.name: AltitudeTypeEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: AMSL = Above Mean Sea Level AGL = Abve Ground Level

enumeratedData.name: TaskModeEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics:
Execute task in non-concurrent mode or concurrent mode.
In the non-concurrent mode the task is placed on the task list for the entity, which serves as a waiting list. Once the task is at the head of the task list, and the currently executing task completes, it is removed from the task list and started. Using this task mode, tasks are executed one after the other.
In the concurrent mode, the task is executed concurrently with other tasks. As soon as the task is accepted for an entity, it is started. With this task mode, there is no task list involved.

enumeratedData.name: PerceivedForceIdentifierEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The percieved affiliation of the detected entity.

enumeratedData.name: PatrolTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: Other - Behaviour is federate application specific (e.g. wait for next command, etc.) Circle - Move to start point of patrol route (federate application deterrmines route) Reverse - Follow the patrol route in reverse order.

enumeratedData.name: PatrolMoveTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: Defines how the movment shall be done during the execution of the patrol. Other - Federate application specific.

arrayData.name: Datetime18
arrayData.semantics: A designation of a specified chronological point measured using Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) ISO 8601:2000 as a standard of reference, constrained to "zero meridian" i.e. �Zulu� time zone only. This is expressed as a composite field using a compacted ISO notation YYYYMMDDHHMMSS.SSS where YYYY represents a year, MM represents a month in values from 00 to 12, and DD represents a day in values from 00 to 31, HH represents an hour, MM represents a minute, and SS.SSS represents the number of seconds and milliseconds.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfSpottedEntities
arrayData.semantics: The spotted entities at a specific time

arrayData.name: ArrayOfSpottedEquipment
arrayData.semantics: An array with spotted equipment at the spotted entity.

fixedRecordData.name: TransactionId
fixedRecordData.semantics: Unique identifier for a transaction. Used for Tasks, ManagementTasks and Reports. The combination of FederateHandle and a counter gives a unique TransactionId in the Federation Execution even if a federate should resign (for some reason) and then join again.

field.name: Counter
field.semantics: This value shall be incremented by 1 for each new TransactionId.

field.name: FederateHandle
field.semantics: The handle that the federate get when joining the federation. Required

fixedRecordData.name: SpottedEntity
fixedRecordData.semantics: Descripton of the observed entity. The symbol contains information about the spotted entity's relation to the spotter and details about the type and echelon at the spotted entity.

field.name: SpottedEntity
field.semantics: The unique identifier for the entity

field.name: Location
field.semantics: The location where the entity were spotted

field.name: Orientation
field.semantics: The orientation in Psi, Theta, Phi [radians]

field.name: Speed
field.semantics:
The speed of the entity (m/s).
Default value: 0 m/s

field.name: Equipment
field.semantics:
Spotted equipment list, type and number.
Default value: Empty array.

field.name: Activity
field.semantics: The current activity of the entity. (Fromm NETN-Base) Default value: Moving (213)

field.name: Symbol
field.semantics:
MIL STD 2525C for the entity, the detailed level may vary, the publishing federate decides the level of details in the symbol description.
Default Ground value: SUGP------***** Default Air value: SUAP------***** Default Sea Surface value: SUSP------***** Default Subsurface value: SUUP------*****

field.name: Type
field.semantics: Use entity types from Supply Types, Expendibles or Sensors/Emitters tables (SISO-REF-010-2010, 4.3), for aggregate entities, also use entity types from platform tables to describe the equipment type.

variantRecordData.name: MineCountVariantStruct
variantRecordData.semantics: The number or density of mines.
